name: PMD Mobility Scooter
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC), Mdm S, is living alone in Ang Mo Kio Ave 4 and requires her daily usage of PMD to be mobile within the community. However, her PMD is wearing down and requires a repair or a replacement. As she has already utilised the SMF funding for her current PMD, she would not be eligible for a 2nd motorized device. 
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking either financial assistance in repairs or donation of a PMD.  
 
If you know of someone who can assist in either, please contact caseworker Anthony at 96546542 or anthony.wang@thkmc.org.sg. We would appreciate if the donor can deliver the item to the client’s place at Blk 257 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 4. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg .

As such, he would like to request for a motorized wheelchair so he can move around more easily

name: Mountain Bicycle
description: The client is a person with mental health concerns, he needs to engage on activity to reduce stress and anxiety. This is one of the way he could release trapped condition. Seeking a kind donor to support the client.

name: 4-wheeled Mobility Scooter
description: Elderly grandmother has multiple health issues and is unfit for work. She requires a 4-wheeled Mobility Scooter to get around and is hoping to get a secondhand one in good condition.

name: 4 wheeled Mobility Scooter
description:
Client is a 51yo man who has Parkinson's Disease and recently suffered a stroke. As a result of his medical illnesses, wife is currently the solebreadwinner for the family of 7 (3 children and 2 elderly parents). 
In a bid to alleviate some of wife's burden, client is currently looking for jobs and if successful, would require a 4-wheel mobility scooter to travel to work.

name: Motorised Scooter
description:
Client is a cancer patient and staying alone. Client has some mobility issues. Thus, having a motorised scooter will allow client to go about his daily activities.

Note: Client can only use a motorised scooter that is able to support 100-150kg   in weight.

name: electric wheelchair
description:
client is requesting for an electric wheelchair due to mobility issues.
 

He recently developed a condition where all his bones are fusing together starting with his legs, and requires a wheelchair to get around. As he is losing mobility in his hands as well, an electric wheelchair would be more appropriate.

name: Motorized Wheelchair Needed for Elderly Client!
description: Client is an elderly woman with limited mobility. She is presently residing alone and is dependent on others when she utilizes her manual wheelchair. The motorized wheelchair will help her to regain her personal independence and enable her to fulfil her day-to-day needs and errands with more ease.

name: Mobility Scooter
description:
Client, 49F, works as a Grabfood deliverer. She is a divorcee and has two children living with her, aged 20M and 16F. She has been using a second-hand mobility scooter with faulty brakes, which has posed as a physical safety concern for her. She suffers from eroded knee joint cartilage on both knees which had been impacted from having to use her legs to control the speed when slowing down. She is also diagnosed with asthma/chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and is on regular inhalers. She gets short of breath when she walks long distances and hence, is heavily reliant on her mobility scooter. 

Client is looking for a replacement mobility scooter that has working brakes. She is open to having a second-hand one as well.

name: Food Rations
description:
The family is in need of the following food items and all the food must be Halal certified the family observes the halal dietary requirements.                                         
                                                              Dry Food:Rice: Golden Eagle (Thai Rice) or other brand @ 1x10kg;1 tray x30 eggs;1 tin x Milo powder;1 tin x Nescafe Coffee Powder;4 tins x 395g Ayam Brand Canned Sardines; 1 bottle x Swee Soya Bean Sauce (Habhal's Kicap Manis); 1 packet x Maggi Mee (Curry); 1 bottle x Nutella Spread. Fresh:	any amount Fruits (banana, red apple, rockmelon, watermelon, mango), Vegetables (Brocolli, round spinach, carrots), 1 packet x white bread. Wet/frozen:1 packet x Chicken nuggets; 1 packet x Popcorn chicken; 2 packet x Fishball; 2 whole fresh chicken pieces; 2 packets x Frozen fish fillet.                                 
                                                              The food items will be delivered to beneficiary's home and please contact us for delivery details. Email: dik@childrensociety.org.sg. Contact No.: 9436 7401.

*Note: Delivery costs will be covered by donors. We appreciate your kind donation and generosity. Every makes a difference!

name: Volunteer Driver
description: This is a family of 3, consisting of a single mother with 2 young children, 1 of whom has Autism. Mother is unable to get daughter (with special needs) adjusted to school bus transport onboarding time in the morning due to daughter’s self injurious behaviours. Mother is unable to afford sending daughter to school via taxi due to financial difficulties. As such, she is requesting for help if there are any volunteer drivers to send her daughter to school in the morning, while the school works on various strategies to manage daughter’s behavioural issues. Mother is flexible with timing as long as it is after 7.30pm.

name: CPAP Machine with Humidifier
description:
On behalf of 1 one of our staff, who has been with us for more than 5 years. He is diagnosed with obstructive sleep apnea. 

He is required to sleep with the monitoring of a respironics dreamstation with humidifier every night. For the last few months, he has been renting the machine weekly, but the cost is quite high for him.
He cannot afford to purchase a set of the respoionics dreamstation with humidifier for regulating his breathing while sleeping.

Hence, we are requesting to support him a CPAP Machine with Humidifier.

We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. WE have total about 80 to 90 in house stay of residents and staffs. The Helping Hand is a Volunteer Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service.

name: Adult Diaper (Brand: Tena) Size XS/S

name: Adult Absorbent Protector

name: QuickVue At-Home OTC COVID-19 Test (25 Tests/Kit)
description:
In line with the present COVID-19 situation, our organisation, The Helping Hand has added layer of ringfencing to help to identify cases and prevent further transmission, we have started conducting mandatory Covid-19 testing to all residents and staff since 15th July 2021.
The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. 
We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premise. We are using the QuickVue At-Home OTC COVID-19 Test (25 Tests/Kit).

Here is the link for the requested item, thank you for your kindness.

https://www.guardian.com.sg/quickvue-at-home-otc-covid-19-test-25-tests-kit/p/619909
